We are the forth generation of craftsmen and designers
and still going strong.

settings.desc:
MIDA, the Florence International Crafts Fair, welcomes every year in the spaces of the Fortezza da Basso artisans and artisanal enterprises of all domains and dimensions, to present to visitors the variety, wealth and quality of a sector that is as hereditary as it is innovative and with an interest that is constantly rising.


With the 87th edition, MIDA will consolidate its commercial, cultural and educational offer, with quality, innovation and sustainability criteria. An unprecedented physical and digital fair model,which accompanies the artisans towards the acquisition of new skills and tools for promoting their work on the market.


The Fair will take place at the Fortezza Da Basso in Florence, from Tuesday 25th April to Monday 1st May 2023.


An extraordinary edition, which has the ambition to restart the sector, starting from Italy, which has in craftsmanship one of the thrusts of its economy, its culture and its future.

clientele of U.S., French, and Spanish ambassadors.

settings.richtext-prt: Feel is the texture and weight of the finished product, determining its best use. The best bedding materialis one that feels comfortable to sleep in depending on the weather, the surroundings, and body heat.

Cotton quality depends on fibre length - longer fibres make a more uniform, resistant and smoother thread. Thread count measures threads per square inch and produces various results of texture and breathability. The higher the thread count, the less air flow; thus, sateens sleep warmer than percales.

The hand, or silkiness, of a fabric is not a result of thread count, but rather the finishing process - a treatment to the woven fabric to increase durability or shine. Cloud9linens fabrics go through a patented finishing process to create the super smooth and lustrous finish unlike any other.

settings.subheading: Enjoy these complimentary benefits exclusive to our account holders
settings.desc:
At Cloud9linens, Branding Partners are able to choose from a variety of styles and designs and are able to customize their measurements. You can pick from various swatches in every product of interest or make your own branded tex-tiles, customizing colors, patterns, monograms, prints, jacquard patterns, and thread counts as the project owner desires or the interior designer recommends.

You can make your own signature textiles and fabrics. Long-staple Egyptian cotton is our core strength. Its composition can be adjusted as per client requirements. Our product lines do not end at bed linens. We are in the terry industry, bedding essentials dining linens, curtains, uniforms, lounging products, and, last but not least, outdoor textiles. Their finished product is used for clubhouses, restaurants, spas, and upholstery.

Cloud9linens' custom design team will help you pick the best fabrics and materials that best suit your project requirements. Our team will be with you throughout the project. We will visit the venue to take measurements and supply all of the design specifications for each product. We will send videos as production proceeds to keep our client in the loop.
